title: 3 bed/ 2 Bath Rent-to-Own Buy before it is Gone!
posting_body: Buy your first home with our hassle-free rent-to-own payment plans!
This is a one-of-a-kind home you will truly appreciate.
Located in an upcoming neighborhood, you are close to the city’s central attractions.
The interiors have been well-thought out.
Its 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms afford a comfortable stay.
The kitchen fitted with appliances and its over and under-the-counter storage reflect its convenience and functionality.
There is a basement for additional storage.
Call or text us by clicking the reply button.
We accept all FICO and credit scores.
